lable.trainingScheduleAmateurGroup: The training schedule of the amateur group
lable.speech: «We are building more than just a team; we are building a legacy where every fighter is a part of a larger family and history.»

aboutPage.history: The DAR Group of Companies has been developing the sports field since 2014, starting with the support of youth hand-to-hand combat in the regions of Kazakhstan. Later, the DAR Team was created, which trained athletes in hand-to-hand combat, grappling, zhekpe-zhek and other types of martial arts. 3,150 athletes from all over the country train in the existing 19 gyms opened by the company over the past 10 years. «We also support sports entrepreneurs from different regions where future champions are growing up. The main thing is to provide all parties involved with stable necessary conditions and opportunities to unleash their talents and potential»
aboutPage.proTeam: In 2020, the professional fighting team DAR TEAM PRO was founded, which prepares Kazakhstani fighters for the world stage. It consists of Shavkat Rakhmonov, Asu Almabayev, Fanil Rafikov, Kazbek Sagyn, Hamlet Aslanov  and other champions.
aboutPage.coaches: Thanks to the experience and support of the older generation of coaches, the real coaching staff of the team has also achieved achievements in the training of international-level athletes.

outsidePage.history: In 2020, the professional fight team DAR TEAM was founded to prepare Kazakhstani athletes for the global stage. The team consists of 20 professionals, including Shavkat Rakhmonov, Asu Almabayev, and others.
outsidePage.proTeam: Since 2014, the DAR team has been launching sports programs for children from vulnerable social groups across Kazakhstan. Beyond athletic training, our professionals teach children logic, critical thinking, foreign languages, and speed reading.
